description: Allows the user to split their body into pieces and control each piece independently. The user is also immune to slashing attacks.

users.circumstances: Buggy ate the fruit at some point in the past

description: Makes the user's body perfectly smooth and slippery, causing attacks and objects to slide off harmlessly. It also removes any excess fat and blemishes, making the user slim and beautiful.

users.circumstances: Alvida ate the fruit after her defeat by Luffy in Episode 2

abilityReveals.description: Alvida uses her smooth body to fight effectively against the Kumate Tribe, with attacks sliding off her.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Alvida demonstrates her devil fruit abilities during the battle against the Kumate Tribe.
